name: Mini Red Jackal Pup
description:
Mini jackal pups are handcrafted with specially selected runes to be the perfect eternal puppy.
Combine 1 Yellow and 2 Red Mini Jackal Pups with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Blue Jackal Pup.
Combine 1 Red and 2 Yellow Mini Jackal Pups with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Green Jackal Pup.
